Class JukeBox

  • java.lang.Object
    • JukeBox

  • public class JukeBox
extends java.lang.Object
    The Music player box. This controls all the music playback, queing and song selection. <\br> If no track is in the que, will play random songs from the tracks database
    Is a singleton, call the get() function to get the instance
    Author:
    Jableader

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static byte STATE_PAUSE 
      static byte STATE_PLAYING 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addToCue(Track t)
      Adds the given track to the end of the cue
      static JukeBox get()
      Gets the working instance of the jukebox.
      Track[] getCue()
      Gets a read only version of the current cue
      Does not include the currently playing track, the next track to play is at index 0
      If cue is empty, returns empty array
      Track getCurrentTrack()
      Gets the currently playing track
      void getState()
      Gets the current state of the jukebox
      void pause()
      Pause the jukebox
      void play()
      Plays the jukebox If it is paused, plays from paused point If stopped, plays next song in the cue
      void skip()
      Stops playback of current song and plays next in the que

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
